item.title: Worst Virus ever?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Polaris:

[quote author=jme_009 link=topic=1981.msg18732#msg18732 date=1146000117]
Smitfraud is pretty bad, but i recall one of the worst is Lop(or something?)

C2Lop? isnt that only adware?

I also once had a virus that changed somthing in windows registry, dont remeber the name, ended up with an MBR Error (Master Boot Record). Not even fdisk command fixed that, just had to trash a HD and buy a new one.[/quote]

No idea, i just recall squigglyo posting about it when he had it, he said it is one of the worst viruses.

Read full topic

item.title: Worst Virus ever?
item.dc:creator: @afi afi
item.description:
@afi wrote:

SomethingToHide:

[quote author=KyleGut3 link=topic=1981.msg18896#msg18896 date=1146019137]
[quote author=afi link=topic=1981.msg18827#msg18827 date=1146011396]
i don't need porn, i guess that's why i have a girlfriend +D

lmfao...
well some of us with girlfriends don't do anything sexual becaues of their beliefs

yeah ive gotten hit with the same goddamned fake windows media player codec from the same series of sites >.<

had to sys restore to get rid of it.
[/quote]

Some of us also like it every now and then even though we have a girlfriend because we're just horny bastards

I remember one time, I spent the night at my best friends house when I was like 6. We were going to Pokemon sites and right clicking all the pictures and saving them to make our own site. Well he had a code on his site where when you right clicked it said that's copyright infringement, I'm reporting you to the authorities and there's a virus on your computer. Then in slow motion type effects, he jumped backwards out of the seat, I pulled the plug, the TV fell over and landed on my legs. We were scared shitless and needless to say we didn't download another picture for a LONGGGG time.[/quote]

i remeber when pokemon was really sexy

Read full topic

I remember one time, I spent the night at my best friends house when I was like 6. We were going to Pokemon sites and right clicking all the pictures and saving them to make our own site. Well he had a code on his site where when you right clicked it said that's copyright infringement, I'm reporting you to the authorities and there's a virus on your computer. Then in slow motion type effects, he jumped backwards out of the seat, I pulled the plug, the TV fell over and landed on my legs. We were scared shitless and needless to say we didn't download another picture for a LONGGGG time.

item.title: Worst Virus ever?
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Me being the stupid one downloaded a keygen, but it came without a .nfo or release note, I knew it was bad but did it anyway. I hurridly deleted what it just downloaded to my computer. The next week I had to reinstall ACID Pro because I messed it up, needless to say I downloaded the exact same thing, and halfway into the double click I realized it. That's what I have on here now.

One time I got a virus from porn which disabled Media Player and Quicktime in all browsers. That sucked.

Read full topic

item.title: Worst Virus ever?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

afi:

How do ya get smitfraud =O

You can get it from viewing a webpage, through the wmf exploit. Even though I had downloaded the fix for the exploit It doesn;t seem to do anything to protect me. Like I said, stay away from crack, porn, and russian sites that you are unfamiliar with. Of course just like any virus, its commonly found in downloads.

Read full topic
